original_text:
Monopoly Big Money Reel
Senza dubbio, il gioco da tavolo Monopoly è un gioco da tavolo iconico di un tempo in cui le famiglie giocavano e passavano il tempo insieme. Oggi è difficile per tutti distogliere lo sguardo dai propri dispositivi mobili abbastanza a lungo da rendersi conto di avere una famiglia. Molti di voi ricorderanno i tempi in cui ci si sedeva attorno a un tavolo, ci si divertiva, si era competitivi e poi si piangeva fino ad addormentarsi quando qualcun altro vinceva la partita.
WMS, i noti sviluppatori di software per il gioco d’azzardo online, hanno ora rilasciato il loro ultimo gioco di Slot a tema Monopoly, la slot gratuita Monopoly Big Money Reel che, a giudicare dalle prime impressioni, sarà un enorme successo. Concentrata su un gioco bonus chiamato ‘Monopoly Big Money Reel Bonus Round’, questa slot online è completamente carica di caratteristiche di gioco che possono essere enormemente redditizie. Date un’occhiata alla nostra recensione su questa impressionante macchina della frutta online a 20 pagamenti e 5 rulli che ha entusiasmato tutti sin dalla sua uscita non molto tempo fa. Sicuramente vi aspetta qualcosa di speciale.
Una grafica da famoso gioco da tavolo
Visivamente, Monopoly Big Money Reel è quello che ci si aspetta da una produzione a tema Monopoly – ha una grafica in stile cartoon ma ha un aspetto lussuoso. Con una colonna sonora molto jazz che suona mentre si fanno girare i rulli, i simboli includono pezzi classici del Monopoli come ditali, stivali, carriole e cappelli a cilindro. Vedrete anche automobili, barche e aerei.
Apparentemente impilati, vi imbatterete in Scotty il cane, un hotel e Mr Monopoly in persona – quest’ultimo è il più gratificante che vi dà 7,5 volte la vostra puntata per 5 su una payline. Il simbolo M pieno di diamanti incastonati è il jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli, tranne i simboli delle baconote, ossia quelle da 20, 50, 100, 200 e 500.
Inizialmente, rimarrete molto impressionati dalla qualità evidente che è stata messa nello sviluppo della slot video Monopoly Big Money Reel. La grafica della slot online, gli effetti sonori e le animazioni del gioco vi colpiranno subito ed è a questo punto che saprete che vi divertirete. Anche le animazioni e la colonna sonora sono buone, anche se quest’ultima potrebbe iniziare a diventare fastidiosa dopo un po’ di tempo – che potrete semplicemente spegnere se lo fa.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Quando si tratta di funzioni bonus, la prima è la funzione Mystery Bills – casualmente, uno qualsiasi dei 5 simboli delle banconote può essere aggiunto alle bobine. Tutte le note possono essere cambiate in 1 del simbolo della nota – riempire le bobine con certi simboli di banconote vi darà 5, 10, 15, 15, 20 o 50 volte la vostra puntata totale.
L’attrazione principale è la funzione Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus che si gioca quando una qualsiasi combinazione di simboli di 5 note appare sui rulli – si fa girare una ruota per vincere bonus in contanti fino a 250 volte la tua puntata, una spinta moltiplicatrice o l’accesso ad altre 2 funzioni bonus.
Nella funzione Bonus di utilità, si inizia con 2,5 volte la puntata come credito – poi si sceglie una mano da Mr Monopoly per rivelare la rotazione, cosa che vi farà raccogliere x2. Per la rotazione, si fa girare il rotolo Big Money Reel per vincere premi in contanti e/o moltiplicatori. Questi continuano fino a quando non si atterra su raccogliere o raccogliere x2 – quest’ultimo raddoppierà l’importo della vincita.
Infine, c’è la funzione Go Free Spins Bonus dove si inizia con 8 giri gratuiti – ogni simbolo Go ti dà un simbolo di nota che cambia tutti i simboli di nota in quella particolare nota su ogni giro gratuito. Si ottiene quindi il premio corrispondente. Con più giri gratuiti da vincere, puoi anche vincere ulteriori bonus in denaro.
Il jolly agirà come qualsiasi altro jolly nelle slot online sostituendo tutti i simboli oltre a quelli per l’ottenimento dei Free Spins. Per quanto riguarda i simboli scatter, questi, secondo noi, sono i simboli più importanti di tutta la Slot online. Atterrando gli scatter almeno cinque volte sui rulli, si attiverà il gioco bonus ‘Big Money Reel’ che è così centrale in questa slot. Ad ognuno dei simboli scatter money bill che sono stati utilizzati verrà assegnato un moltiplicatore che si attaccherà ad essi per tutta la durata del gioco bonus.
Una volta che i moltiplicatori sono stati impostati, vi verrà dato un numero casuale di giri sul big reel prima di iniziare a girare. Tutti i simboli rimanenti sono i simboli standard paganti più alti e più bassi che premieranno i pagamenti se li trovi sulle paylines almeno tre volte di fila.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Per quelli di voi che hanno davvero una passione sfrenata per Monopoly, ci sono un paio di altri titoli di WMS che potreste voler vedere. “Monopoly Big Event” e “Monopoly Once Around the World” sono entrambi in circolazione da più tempo di Big Reel, ma hanno entrambi riscosso un enorme successo. Il primo ha 20 linee di pagamento e 5 bobine, mentre il secondo contiene 15 linee di pagamento e 5 bobine.
Nessuna delle due ha la stessa qualità di caratteristiche di Big Reel, ma sono entrambe molto divertenti. Infatti, il Big Event, con i suoi giri gratis, i moltiplicatori, la bassa varianza lo hanno reso una slot molto popolare che ancora oggi viene giocato da molti.

raw_translation.response:
Monopoly Big Money Reel

Undoubtedly, the board game Monopoly is an iconic pastime from a time when families played together and spent quality time together. Today, it's hard for anyone to take their eyes off their mobile devices long enough to realize they have a family. Many of you will remember the times when you would sit around a table, have fun, be competitive and then cry yourself to sleep when someone else won the game. 

Now, the well-known online gambling software developers, WMS, have released their latest Monopoly-themed slot game, the free Monopoly Big Money Reel slot, which, judging by first impressions, will be a huge success. Focused on a bonus game called "Monopoly Big Money Reel Bonus Round," this online slot features game features that can be enormously profitable. Take a look at our review of this impressive 20-payline, 5-reel online fruit machine that has been thrilling players since its release not long ago. Surely, something special awaits you.

A graphic from a famous board game

Visually, Monopoly Big Money Reel is what you would expect from a Monopoly-themed production - it has cartoon-style graphics but has a luxurious look. With a jazzy soundtrack that plays while you spin the reels, the symbols include classic Monopoly pieces such as thimbles, boots, carts, and top hats. You will also see cars, boats, and planes.

Apparently stacked, you will come across Scotty the dog, a hotel, and Mr. Monopoly himself - the latter being the most rewarding that gives you 7.5 times your bet for 5 on a payline. The diamond-studded "M" symbol is the wild and substitutes for all symbols except the banknote symbols, which are worth 20, 50, 100, 200, and 500. 

You will be impressed by the apparent quality that has been put into the development of the Monopoly Big Money Reel video slot game. The online slot graphics, sound effects, and game animations will immediately strike you, and at this point, you will know that you will have fun. Even the animations and soundtrack are good, although the latter may begin to become annoying after a while - which you can easily turn off if it does.

Features and symbols of the Slot Machine

When it comes to bonus features, the first is the Mystery Bills feature - randomly, any of the 5 banknote symbols can be added to the reels. All notes can be changed to one of the note symbols - filling the reels with certain note symbols will give you 5, 10, 15, 15, 20, or 50 times your total bet.

The main attraction is the Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus feature that is played when any combination of 5 banknote symbols appears on the reels - spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet, a multiplier boost, or access to 2 more bonus features.

In the Utility Bonus feature, you start with 2.5 times the bet as credit - then choose a hand from Mr. Monopoly to reveal the spin, which will make you collect x2. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. These continue until you land on Collect or Collect x2 - the latter will double the amount of your win.

Finally, there is the Go Free Spins Bonus feature where you start with 8 free spins - each Go symbol gives you a banknote symbol that changes all note symbols to that particular note on each free spin. You then get the corresponding prize. With more free spins to be won, you can also win additional cash bonuses.

The wild will act like any other wild in online slots, substituting for all symbols except those for Free Spins. As for the scatter symbols, these are, in our opinion, the most important symbols in the entire online slot. Landing the scatters at least five times on the reels will activate the "Big Money Reel" bonus game, which is so central to this slot. Each of the money bill scatter symbols used will be assigned a multiplier that will stick with them for the duration of the bonus game.

Once the multipliers are set, you will be given a random number of spins on the big reel before starting to spin. All remaining symbols are standard paying symbols, the highest and lowest that will award payouts if you find them on paylines at least three times in a row.

Other Similar Slot Machines

For those of you who have a real passion for Monopoly, there are a couple of other WMS titles you might want to check out. "Monopoly Big Event" and "Monopoly Once Around the World" have both been around longer than Big Reel but have both been hugely successful. The first has 20 paylines and 5 reels, while the second has 15 paylines and 5 reels.

Neither has the same quality of Big Reel features, but they are both a lot of fun. In fact, Big Event, with its free spins, multipliers, and low variance, has made it a very popular slot game that is still played by many today.

Monopoly Big Money Reel

Undoubtedly, the Monopoly board game is an iconic game from a time when families used to play and spend time together. Nowadays, it's hard for everyone to take their eyes off their mobile devices long enough to realize they have a family. Many of you will remember the times when you sat around a table, had fun, were competitive, and then cried yourself to sleep when someone else won the game.

WMS, the well-known developers of online gambling software, have now released their latest Monopoly-themed slot game, the free Monopoly Big Money Reel slot, which, judging by first impressions, will be a huge success. Focused on a ‘Monopoly Big Money Reel Bonus Round’ bonus game, this online slot is fully loaded with game features that can be hugely profitable. Check out our review on this impressive online fruit machine with 20 paylines and 5 reels that has excited everyone since its release not long ago. Surely, something special awaits you.

A Familiar Board Game Visual

Visually, Monopoly Big Money Reel is what you’d expect from a Monopoly-themed production – it has a cartoonish style graphics but has a luxurious look. With a very jazzy soundtrack playing as the reels spin, the symbols include classic Monopoly pieces such as thimbles, boots, wheelbarrows, and top hats. You’ll also see automobiles, boats, and planes.

Seemingly stacked, you’ll come across Scotty the dog, a hotel, and Mr. Monopoly himself – the latter being the most rewarding, giving you 7.5 times your bet for 5 on a payline. The diamond-embedded M symbol is the wild and replaces all symbols except for the banknote symbols, namely the 20, 50, 100, 200, and 500.

Initially, you will be very impressed by the apparent quality that has been put into the development of the Monopoly Big Money Reel video slot. The graphics of the online slot, sound effects, and game animations will strike you immediately and it is at this point that you know you will have fun. The animations and soundtrack are good too, although the latter may start to become annoying after a while – which you can simply turn off if it does.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

When it comes to bonus features, the first is the Mystery Bills feature – randomly, any of the 5 banknote symbols can be added to the reels. All notes can be changed into 1 of the note symbol – filling the reels with certain banknote symbols will give you 5, 10, 15, 15, 20, or 50 times your total bet.

The main attraction is the Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus feature which is played when any combination of 5 note symbols appears on the reels – you spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet, a multiplier boost, or access to 2 other bonus features.

In the Utility Bonus feature, you start with 2.5 times your bet as credits – then you choose a hand from Mr. Monopoly to reveal the spin, which will make you collect x2. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. These continue until you land on Collect or Collect x2 – the latter will double the amount of your win.

Finally, there is the Go Free Spins Bonus feature where you start with 8 free spins – each Go symbol will give you a note symbol that changes all note symbols to that particular note on each free spin. You then get the corresponding prize. With more free spins to be won, you can also win additional cash bonuses.

The wild will act like any other wild in online slots, substituting all symbols except for those for getting Free Spins. As for the scatter symbols, these, in our opinion, are the most important symbols of the entire online slot. Landing the scatter symbols at least five times on the reels will trigger the ‘Big Money Reel’ bonus game which is so central to this slot. Each of the money bill scatter symbols that have been used will be assigned a multiplier that will stick to them for the duration of the bonus game.

Once the multipliers have been set, you will be given a random number of spins on the big reel before it starts spinning. All remaining symbols are the highest and lowest-paying standard paying symbols that will award payouts if you find them on paylines at least three times in a row.

Similar Slot Machines

For those of you who have a really passionate devotion to Monopoly, there are a couple of other WMS titles you may want to look at. "Monopoly Big Event" and "Monopoly Once Around the World" have both been around longer than Big Reel but have both been hugely successful. The former has 20 paylines and 5 reels, while the latter has 15 paylines and 5 reels.

Neither has the same quality of features as Big Reel, but they are both a lot of fun. In fact, Big Event, with its free spins, multipliers, and low variance, has made it a very popular slot that is still played by many today.

The main attraction is the Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus feature which is played when any combination of 5 note symbols appears on the reels – you spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet, a multiplier boost, or access to 2 other bonus features.

In the Utility Bonus feature, you start with 2.5 times your bet as credits – then you choose a hand from Mr. Monopoly to reveal the spin, which will make you collect x2. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. These continue until you land on Collect or Collect x2 – the latter will double the amount of your win.

Finally, there is the Go Free Spins Bonus feature where you start with 8 free spins – each Go symbol will give you a note symbol that changes all note symbols to that particular note on each free spin. You then get the corresponding prize. With more free spins to be won, you can also win additional cash bonuses.

The wild will act like any other wild in online slots, substituting all symbols except for those for getting Free Spins. As for the scatter symbols, these, in our opinion, are the most important symbols of the entire online slot. Landing the scatter symbols at least five times on the reels will trigger the ‘Big Money Reel’ bonus game which is so central to this slot. Each of the money bill scatter symbols that have been used will be assigned a multiplier that will stick to them for the duration of the bonus game.

Once the multipliers have been set, you will be given a random number of spins on the big reel before it starts spinning. All remaining symbols are the highest and lowest-paying standard paying symbols that will award payouts if you find them on paylines at least three times in a row.

Similar Slot Machines

For those of you who have a really passionate devotion to Monopoly, there are a couple of other WMS titles you may want to look at. "Monopoly Big Event" and "Monopoly Once Around the World" have both been around longer than Big Reel but have both been hugely successful. The former has 20 paylines and 5 reels, while the latter has 15 paylines and 5 reels.

Neither has the same quality of features as Big Reel, but they are both a lot of fun. In fact, Big Event, with its free spins, multipliers, and low variance, has made it a very popular slot that is still played by many today.

Review:
 
Bonus Features

Monopoly Big Money Reel is loaded with bonus features that make it an exciting game. The Mystery Bills feature randomly adds any of the 5 banknote symbols to the reels. The Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus feature is triggered when any combination of 5 note symbols appears on the reels. You spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet or access to 2 other bonus features. In the Utility Bonus feature, you can win cash prizes and/or multipliers. The Go Free Spins Bonus feature awards 8 free spins with the chance to win additional cash bonuses and free spins.

Mystery Bills Feature

Randomly, any of the 5 banknote symbols can be added to the reels. All notes can be changed into 1 of the note symbol – filling the reels with certain banknote symbols will give you 5, 10, 15, 15, 20, or 50 times your total bet.

Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus Feature

This feature is played when any combination of 5 note symbols appears on the reels. You spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet, a multiplier boost, or access to 2 other bonus features.

Utility Bonus

In the Utility Bonus feature, you start with 2.5 times your bet as credits – then you choose a hand from Mr. Monopoly to reveal the spin, which will make you collect x2. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. These continue until you land on Collect or Collect x2 – the latter will double the amount of your win.

Go Free Spins Bonus

The Go Free Spins Bonus feature awards 8 free spins with the chance to win additional cash bonuses and free spins. Each Go symbol will give you a note symbol that changes all note symbols to that particular note on each free spin. You then get the corresponding prize.

Graphics and Sound Effects

Visually, Monopoly Big Money Reel has a cartoonish style with a luxurious look. The symbols include classic Monopoly pieces such as thimbles, boots, wheelbarrows, and top hats, as well as automobiles, boats, and planes. The graphics, sound effects, and game animations are of high quality and impressive. The soundtrack, although good, may become annoying after a while.

Paylines and Reels

Monopoly Big Money Reel is an online fruit machine with 20 paylines and 5 reels.

Standard Symbols

In addition to the bonus symbols, the standard symbols are the highest and lowest-paying, including Scotty the dog, a hotel, and Mr. Monopoly himself – the latter being the most rewarding, giving you 7.5 times your bet for 5 on a payline. The diamond-embedded M symbol is the wild and replaces all symbols except for the banknote symbols, namely the 20, 50, 100, 200, and 500.

In addition to the Mystery Bills and Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus features, Monopoly Big Money Reel also features the Utility Bonus feature and the Go Free Spins Bonus feature. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. The Go Free Spins Bonus feature offers players eight free spins with the chance to win additional cash bonuses.

Paylines and Reels

The wild symbol is represented by the diamond-embedded M symbol and replaces all symbols except for the banknote symbols, namely the 20, 50, 100, 200, and 500. With an impressive array of bonus features, the game offers huge profit potential for players. Review: Monopoly Big Money Reel

Undoubtedly, the Monopoly board game is an iconic game from a time when families used to play and spend time together. Nowadays, it's hard for everyone to take their eyes off their mobile devices long enough to realize they have a family. Many of you will remember the times when you sat around a table, had fun, were competitive, and then cried yourself to sleep when someone else won the game.

WMS, the well-known developers of online gambling software, have now released their latest Monopoly-themed slot game, the free Monopoly Big Money Reel slot, which, judging by first impressions, will be a huge success. Focused on a ‘Monopoly Big Money Reel Bonus Round’ bonus game, this online slot is fully loaded with game features that can be hugely profitable. Check out our review on this impressive online fruit machine with 20 paylines and 5 reels that has excited everyone since its release not long ago. Surely, something special awaits you.

A Familiar Board Game Visual

Visually, Monopoly Big Money Reel is what you’d expect from a Monopoly-themed production – it has a cartoonish style graphics but has a luxurious look. With a very jazzy soundtrack playing as the reels spin, the symbols include classic Monopoly pieces such as thimbles, boots, wheelbarrows, and top hats. You’ll also see automobiles, boats, and planes.

Seemingly stacked, you’ll come across Scotty the dog, a hotel, and Mr. Monopoly himself – the latter being the most rewarding, giving you 7.5 times your bet for 5 on a payline. The diamond-embedded M symbol is the wild and replaces all symbols except for the banknote symbols, namely the 20, 50, 100, 200, and 500.

Initially, you will be very impressed by the apparent quality that has been put into the development of the Monopoly Big Money Reel video slot. The graphics of the online slot, sound effects, and game animations will strike you immediately and it is at this point that you know you will have fun. The animations and soundtrack are good too, although the latter may start to become annoying after a while – which you can simply turn off if it does.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

When it comes to bonus features, the first is the Mystery Bills feature – randomly, any of the 5 banknote symbols can be added to the reels. All notes can be changed into 1 of the note symbol – filling the reels with certain banknote symbols will give you 5, 10, 15, 15, 20, or 50 times your total bet.

The main attraction is the Monopoly Big Money Reel Spin Bonus feature which is played when any combination of 5 note symbols appears on the reels – you spin a wheel to win cash bonuses up to 250 times your bet, a multiplier boost, or access to 2 other bonus features.

In the Utility Bonus feature, you start with 2.5 times your bet as credits – then you choose a hand from Mr. Monopoly to reveal the spin, which will make you collect x2. For the spin, you spin the Big Money Reel to win cash prizes and/or multipliers. These continue until you land on Collect or Collect x2 – the latter will double the amount of your win.

Finally, there is the Go Free Spins Bonus feature where you start with 8 free spins – each Go symbol will give you a note symbol that changes all note symbols to that particular note on each free spin. You then get the corresponding prize. With more free spins to be won, you can also win additional cash bonuses.

The wild will act like any other wild in online slots, substituting all symbols except for those for getting Free Spins. As for the scatter symbols, these, in our opinion, are the most important symbols of the entire online slot. Landing the scatter symbols at least five times on the reels will trigger the ‘Big Money Reel’ bonus game which is so central to this slot. Each of the money bill scatter symbols that have been used will be assigned a multiplier that will stick to them for the duration of the bonus game.

Once the multipliers have been set, you will be given a random number of spins on the big reel before it starts spinning. All remaining symbols are the highest and lowest-paying standard paying symbols that will award payouts if you find them on paylines at least three times in a row.

Similar Slot Machines

For those of you who have a really passionate devotion to Monopoly, there are a couple of other WMS titles you may want to look at. "Monopoly Big Event" and "Monopoly Once Around the World" have both been around longer than Big Reel but have both been hugely successful. The former has 20 paylines and 5 reels, while the latter has 15 paylines and 5 reels.

Neither has the same quality of features as Big Reel, but they are both a lot of fun. In fact, Big Event, with its free spins, multipliers, and low variance, has made it a very popular slot that is still played by many today.
